H0.text: What colour are the flowers of a hawkbit plant. Pink

H1.text: What colour are the flowers of a hawkbit plant. Purple

H2.text: What colour are the flowers of a hawkbit plant. White

H3.text: What colour are the flowers of a hawkbit plant. Yelow

A4.text: Each bloom consists of five to six small yellow clustered spikelet-florets surrounded by fuzzy white 'petals' (technically, bracts) in a double-star formation.
